Class QAHelper1

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.QAHelper1
public class QAHelper1 extends Object

Database helper for the Question, Answer and Review database tables.

A helper class to initialize and manage the SQL tables for all Questions, Answers and Reviews. QAHelper1 contains all functions necessary to Create, Read, Update and Delete data from each table along with many more to help maintain the database.

Version:
0.00 2025-02-28 - Initial baseline

0.01 2025-03-31 - Added Javadoc comments

Author:
Kyle Pierce

Zachary Chalmers

Chris Espinal

Darren Fernandes

Dara Gafoor

Joseph Morgan

      public void markAnswerAsRead(int answerId, int userId) throws SQLException
      This helps us keep track of how many 'unread' answers remain for each question or user.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The answer id of the answer you wish to mark read
      userId - The user id of the user that is reading the answer
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the database throws an error

      public boolean isAnswerMarkedAsRead(int answerId, int userId) throws SQLException
      Returns a boolean that indicates of a answer has been marked read by the user.
      Parameters:
      answerId - The answer id of the answer you wish to check if is read
      userId - The user id of the user that you want to check to see if they have read the answer
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the function was successfully performed
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the database throws an error

    • getMessageCount

      public Integer getMessageCount(Integer referenceId, char referenceType) throws SQLException
      Searches the message table database and returns the number of message relating to that object
      Parameters:
      referenceId - The id of the object you are working with
      referenceType - The type of object passed in the first parameter
      Returns:
      An Integer representing the total messages
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the database throws an error

    • getTotalMessageCountForUser

      public int getTotalMessageCountForUser(int userId) throws SQLException
      Returns the total number of messages in the system for a given user. This includes all messages where the user is either the sender or the recipient.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID to search messages for.
      Returns:
      The total number of messages related to the user.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • registerVoteForReview

      public void registerVoteForReview(Integer reviewId, Integer vote)
      Registers a new vote for a review object in the SQL table
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The id of the review you are working with
      vote - An integer representing an upvote or downvote for a review

    • getReviewCountForReviewer

      public Integer getReviewCountForReviewer(Integer userId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the count of reviews in the database written by a user
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user you are working with
      Returns:
      An Integer value representing the number of reviews for a user id
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the database throws an error

    • getVoteCountForReviewer

      public Integer getVoteCountForReviewer(Integer userId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the sum of review votes for a user - votes are upvote/downvotes on reviews
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user you are working with
      Returns:
      An Integer value representing the total upvote/downvote count on reviews authored by a user id
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the database throws an error

    • getVoteCountForReview

      public Integer getVoteCountForReview(Integer reviewId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the vote value for a review - votes are upvote/downvotes on reviews
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The id of the review you are working with
      Returns:
      An Integer value representing the upvote/downvote total for a review
      Throws:
      SQLException - In case the database throws an error

    • getReviewerRating

      public Integer getReviewerRating(Integer userId)
      Retrieves the reviewer rating using getReviewCountForReviewer() and getVoteCountForReviewer
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user you are working with
      Returns:
      An Integer value representing a reviewers total reviewer rating
